title: (Mon Early) George Birge Performs His Viral Hit + Eddie Wants To Put A Basketball Hoop in His Neighbor’s Yard + Mailbag: Should I Fight My Brother-in-Law?
itunes:title: (Mon Early) George Birge Performs His Viral Hit + Eddie Wants To Put A Basketball Hoop in His Neighbor’s Yard + Mailbag: Should I Fight My Brother-in-Law?
description:
George Birge stops by to perform his viral hit “Beer Beer Truck Truck” and the amazing story behind it. He went from almost giving up his career as an artist to writing a clever song that blew up on TikTok! Eddie shares what he wants to do in his neighborhood that we think is a bad idea. In the mailbag, a listener is debating on whether he should take up his brother-in-law on his challenge to a boxing match.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
